author: IGN
description: Meet Sanemi Shinazugawa and see the character in action in this latest Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 trailer for the upcoming action game. Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 will be available on PC, PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch on August 5, 2025.
title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 - Official Sanemi Shinazugawa Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join creative director Graeme Timmins and senior project producer Anthony Nicholson and members of the development team at Gearbox Software for a deep dive into the gameplay of Borderlands 4 in this latest overview for the upcoming looter shooter game. Check out nearly 20 minutes of gameplay from Borderlands 4 as the developers introduce you to the deadly regions of Kairos you'll explore, give a peek into the story, two of the four new Vault Hunters (Vex, the Siren and Rafa, the Exo-Soldier), lobby system, show off a mission in a mountainous area, glide skills, some enemies you'll encounter, a variety of weapons, enhancements, overhauled drop rates and loot, combat, different builds, breakdown Action Skills, a cat companion, new characters, familiar faces (like Claptrap), a peek at a boss fight, and more. Borderlands 4 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store), and Xbox Series X/S on September 12, 2025. It is also coming to Nintendo Switch 2.

Borde
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Gameplay Overview | State of Play 2025

author: IGN
title: Borderlands 4 has new traversal mechanics such as double jumping, gliding, and more! #gaming

author: IGN
description:
Check out this new Andor: Season 2 clip from the Star Wars series. Andor: Season 2 stars Diego Luna, Stellan Skarsgård, Genevieve O’Reilly, Denise Gough, Kyle Soller, Adria Arjona, Alan Tudyk, Faye Marsay, Varada Sethu, Elizabeth Dulau, with Ben Mendelsohn and Forest Whitaker. Andor: Season 2 is streaming now on Disney+.

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal the plans to the Empire’s weapon of mass destruction—The Death Star—setting the stage for the events of the original 1977 film. “Andor” sets the clock back five years from the events of “Rogue One” to tell the story of the film’s hero, Cassian Andor, and his transformation fr
title: Andor: Season 2 - Official 'Turn Out the Lights' Clip (2025) Denise Gough, Kyle Soller

author: IGN
description:
SPOILER WARNING: Andor season 2, episodes 4-6, reviewed by Clint Gage.

It’s hard to discount part of the journey because it’s not the destination, but you can tell that Andor is on its way to something great. This second episode drop focuses on the struggle to maintain control of the conflict between the Empire and the Rebellion by exploring depths of character rarely seen from Star Wars. Andor slows down a bit here in chapter 2, but is no less intriguing for it.

#IGN #StarWars #Andor
title: Star Wars Needs You To ‘Calibrate Your Enthusiasm’ | Andor Season 2, Chapter 2 Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out action-packed gameplay, enemies, and more from Borderlands 4 in this latest trailer for the upcoming looter shooter game. The trailer confirms its new release date. Borderlands 4 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PC, and Xbox Series X/S on September 12, 2025. It is also coming to Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Gameplay Trailer | State of Play 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Agent Cobra Bubbles' Teaser Trailer for Lilo & Stitch, a live-action adaptation of the hit animated series distributed by Disney. Agent Cobra Bubbles is tasked with the most highly-classified mission any man has undertaken in the history of humanity by securing Experiment 626, Stitch. Lilo & Stitch is in theaters on May 23.

Stitch goes on an out-of-this-world adventure after a daring escape from a galactic space station that takes him to Earth. Lilo and Stitch become acquainted as Stitch not only learns the customs and traditions of life on Earth, but also the core values of family.

Lilo & Stitch stars Chris Sanders, Maia Kealoha, Sydney Agudong, Courtney B. Vance, Zach Galifianakis, and more. Lilo & Stitch is directed by Dean Fleischer Camp and written by Chris Kekaniokalani Bright, Dean DeBlois, and Chris Sanders.

Lilo & Stitch releases in theaters on May 23.
title: Lilo & Stitch - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Maia Kealoha, Courtney B. Vance

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Hello Sunshine teaser trailer for this upcoming survival mystery RPG set in the ruins of a corporate empire. Walk in the shadow of a giant robot during the hot days; stay close to keep warm at night. Scavenge, craft, upgrade — and piece together the broken puzzle of a world ruled by machines that refuse to shut down.

Hello Sunshine will be available on PC (Steam).
title: Hello Sunshine - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Year 1 Roadmap Update Overview Trailer for Assassin's Creed Shadows, the latest entry in the action stealth RPG series developed by Ubisoft. Players can get the rundown on the Year 1 plans for the content being introduced to Assassin's Creed Shadows including new free quests, feature updates, Codex expansions, special collaborations, and community-driven improvements. Players can also anticipate the upcoming Claws of Awaji Expansion set to bring all-new content for players to enjoy. Assassin's Creed Shadows is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows - Official Year 1 Roadmap Update Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After an exclusive look at The Outer Worlds 2, this sequel isn’t just aiming to be bigger, it’s gunning to be a better RPG from every angle. Previewed by Michael Higham

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Outer Worlds 2: The First Preview

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Wick is Pain trailer. Wick is Pain is the incredible true story behind the John Wick franchise, starring Keanu Reeves. In never-before-seen footage captured over a decade on and off set, the film chronicles John Wick’s journey from independent film—facing a mountain of creative, financial, and personal challenges—into a global phenomenon that redefined the action genre and launched three megahit sequels. Join Keanu Reeves, director Chad Stahelski, and the extended Wick cast and crew as they go behind the scenes of this billion-dollar franchise that almost never happened. The film will be available on digital May 9, 2025.

#JohnWick #Movies #IGN
title: Wick is Pain - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Keanu Reeves

author: IGN
description: Watch the PlayStation and Xbox Announcement Trailer for Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate, an isometric action roguelike developed by Super Evil Megacorp. Players will take to the streets in high-octane gameplay alone or in co-op via Local Play or Online. The recently released Casey Jones DLC will also be available day one for the new platforms. Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate is launching on PlayStation 4 (PS4) and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on May 20, with a release on Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S on June 24.
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate - Official PlayStation and Xbox Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Then & Now' Behind The Scenes Video for The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered, a remastered version of the legendary installment of The Elder Scrolls franchise developed by Bethesda Game Studios. Watch as the same original team from the development of The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion in 2006 returns to watch a documentary from that era, almost two decades later, to celebrate the Remaster. The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming #Oblivion
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered - Official 'Then & Now' Behind The Scenes Clip

author: IGN
description:
Get a behind-the-scenes look at the recording process of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 in this new video for the upcoming RPG. Jennifer English (Baldur’s Gate III), Ben Starr (FINAL FANTASY XVI), Kirsty Rider (The Sandman), Shala Nyx (The Old Guard), Rich Keeble (Good Omens), and Maxence Cazorla (Ineffable) discuss their roles and share their experiences bringing their characters to life.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33's cast also includes Charlie Cox (Marvel Television's Daredevil: Born Again), Andy Serkis (The Lord of the Rings), Devora Wilde (Baldur’s Gate III), and Tracy Wiles (Baldur’s Gate III). 

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, Epic Games Store, and Steam on April 24, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Official Behind the Scenes: Voices (Ben Starr, Jennifer English)

author: IGN
description:
Watch the This is Spinal Tap - 41st Anniversary trailer. Created by Rob Reiner, Christopher Guest, Michael McKean, and Harry Shearer, This Is Spinal Tap chronicles England’s loudest and most punctual band on their disaster-filled U.S. tour.

This Is Spinal Tap - 41st Anniversary Re-Release only in theaters starting July 5th.

#SpinalTap #Trailer #IGN
title: This is Spinal Tap - 41st Anniversary - Official Trailer (2025) Christopher Guest, Harry Shearer

author: IGN
description: Hypercharge: Unboxed launches on PS5 (PlayStation 5) and PS4 (PlayStation 4) on May 30, 2025. Are you ready to become an action figure? Check out the latest Hypercharge: Unboxed for another look at this first and third-person shooter action figure game. Grab your friends, complete objectives, defend the Hypercore against waves of weaponized toys, and defeat Major Evil together in the story campaign. Hypercharge: Unboxed is also available now on Xbox, PC, and Nintendo Switch.
title: Hypercharge: Unboxed - Official PS5 & PS4 Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Building Arrakis' Overview Trailer for Dune: Awakening, a multiplayer survival open-world game developed by Funcom. Players will claim a portion of the desert planet of Arrakis to build up a small shelter into a formidable stronghold. Get the rundown on how the building mechanics of Dune: Awakening can turn the tides of the power dynamics of Arrakis itself. Dune: Awakening is launching on June 10 for PC (Steam) with a release on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S at a later date.

#DuneAwakening #Dune #Gaming
title: Dune: Awakening - Official 'Building Arrakis' Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's the The Death of Snow White trailer. Hunted by her evil stepmother, Snow White must overcome the horrors of the dark forest and make unlikely friends with 7 murderous dwarves in this dark retelling of the classic fairy tale. Directed by Jason Brooks, the horror film stars Sanae Loutsis, Chelsea Edmundson, Tristan Nokes, Meredith Binder, Risa Mei, and Ali Chapman.

#Horror #Movies #IGN
title: The Death of Snow White - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Sanae Loutsis, Chelsea Edmundson
